sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Wrapper :paddingTop="paddingTop">
    <AppHeader ref="header" title="系统消息"></AppHeader>
    <!-- loading组件 -->
    <AppLoading v-if="firstIn"></AppLoading>
    <!-- 消息列表项模块 -->
    <MessageList :userLists="userLists" :maibao="maibao" :pushmsg="pushmsg"></MessageList>
  </Wrapper>
</template>
<script>
import messageApi from '../../../api/message/index'
import AppLoading from '../../../components/AppLoading/index'
import AppHeader from '../../../components/AppHeader'
import MessageList from '../../../components/MessageList/index'
import Wrapper from '../../../components/Wrapper/index'
import dialogService from '../../../service/dialogService'
import { mapState } from 'vuex'
export default {
  name: 'message-system',
  data() {
    return {
      maibao: null, // 小脉宝消息
      pushmsg: null, // 推送消息
      userLists: [], // 用户消息列表
      popRed: false, //小红点
      firstIn: true // 第一次进入
    }
  },
  components: {
    AppLoading,
    Wrapper,
    AppHeader,
    MessageList
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState({
      platform: state => state.system.platform
    }),
    paddingTop: function() {
      return this.platform === 'wechat' ? '0px' : '100px'
    }
  },
  async mounted() {
    Promise.all([
      messageApi.getXiaomaibao(),
      messageApi.getUserlist(),
      messageApi.getPush(1)
    ])
      .then(result => {
        if (result[0].data.list.data) {
          this.maibao = result[0].data.list.data[0]
        }
        this.popRed = result[0].data.pop_flag
        this.userLists = result[1].data.list.data
        if (result[2].data.list) {
          this.pushmsg = result[2].data.list.data[0]
        }
        this.firstIn = false
      })
      .catch(error => {
        console.log(error) // 失败了
        this.firstIn = false
      })
  },
  methods: {
    touser(id) {
      this.$router.push('/message/user?id=' + id)
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
</style>
